name: CoinGecko
natural_language_description: 这是 CoinGecko 节点。主要用于: Consume CoinGecko API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: coin

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many events

searchBy.name: searchBy
searchBy.description: Search by coin ID or contract address
searchBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search By | 作用: Search by coin ID or contract address | 默认值: coinId | (必填项)

coinId.name: coinId
coinId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
coinId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Coin Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

baseCurrency.name: baseCurrency
baseCurrency.description: The first currency in the pair. For BTC:ETH this is BTC. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
baseCurrency.natural_language_description: 参数名: Base Currency Name or ID | 作用: The first currency in the pair. For BTC:ETH this is BTC. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

baseCurrencies.name: baseCurrencies
baseCurrencies.description: The first currency in the pair. For BTC:ETH this is BTC. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
baseCurrencies.natural_language_description: 参数名: Base Currency Names or IDs | 作用: The first currency in the pair. For BTC:ETH this is BTC. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

platformId.name: platformId
platformId.description: The ID of the platform issuing tokens
platformId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Platform ID | 作用: The ID of the platform issuing tokens | 默认值: ethereum | (必填项)

contractAddress.name: contractAddress
contractAddress.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contract Address | 作用: Token's contract address | (必填项)

contractAddresses.name: contractAddresses
contractAddresses.description: The contract address of tokens, comma-separated
contractAddresses.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contract Addresses | 作用: The contract address of tokens, comma-separated | (必填项)

quoteCurrency.name: quoteCurrency
quoteCurrency.description: The second currency in the pair. For BTC:ETH this is ETH. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
quoteCurrency.natural_language_description: 参数名: Quote Currency Name or ID | 作用: The second currency in the pair. For BTC:ETH this is ETH. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

quoteCurrencies.name: quoteCurrencies
quoteCurrencies.description: The second currency in the pair. For BTC:ETH this is ETH. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
quoteCurrencies.natural_language_description: 参数名: Quote Currency Names or IDs | 作用: The second currency in the pair. For BTC:ETH this is ETH. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

days.name: days
days.description: Return data for this many days in the past from now
days.natural_language_description: 参数名: Range (Days) | 作用: Return data for this many days in the past from now | (必填项)

date.name: date
date.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date | 作用: The date of data snapshot | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: country_code (值: None) - Country code of event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
from_date (值: None) - Lists events after this date
to_date (值: None) - Lists events before this date
type (值: None) - Type of event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
upcoming_events_only (值: None) - Whether to list only upcoming events
